title: [Aniwaya's Outfitting]
[Aniwaya's General Store]
[Aniwaya's Magic Shoppe]
description: Enclosed by patterned white walls, the shop features a life-sized granite maiden statue in the center of its cherrywood floor.  A gold silk crown tapestry hangs under the mahogany ceiling.  Right near the front is a long mahogany rack and a wide faenor-trimmed table.
